title: Polycarbonate Clear Serving Spoon Set of 12
description: Serving spoons are the central essential for your buffet cold and hot food lines. They are available in a wide range of colors and in solid or perforated styles to meet all your serving needs. Available only in the case pack.1-piece construction of our most durable plastic, polycarbonateCarries a 2 year warrantyRecommended for temperatures up to 212°F; withstands dry heat up to 270°FHandle has notch so spoon can rest on edge of food pan, and slot at end for hangingNSF listed, dishwasher safe
